title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2007 (S.I. No. 707 of 2007) (as
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Technical
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Technical 

Measures) (Amendment) Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited sea-fisheries (technical measures) (amendment) regulation 2022

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2007 (S.I. No. 707 of 2007) (as
heading: 2. The Sea-Fisheries (Technical Measures) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 520
text_raw:
2. The Sea-Fisheries (Technical Measures) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 520 
of 2019) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by the insertion after “20 June 2019” 
in the definition of “Council Regulation” of the following: “as amended by 
Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2021/2324 of 23 August 2021”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 March, 2022. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

1 OJ L 318, 7.12.1984, p. 23 
2 OJ L 90, 2.4.1987, p. 29 
3 OJ L 203, 15.7.1989, p. 21 
4 OJ L 46, 16.2.2007, p. 9 
5 OJ L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 105 
6 OJ L 465, 29.12.2021, p.1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 10th May, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [223] 3

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2007 (S.I. No. 707 of 2007) (as
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This instrument amends the Sea-Fisheries (Technical Measures) Regulations 
2019 (S.I. No. 520 of 2019) to give effect to Commission Delegated Regulation 
(EU) 2021/2324 of 23 August 2021 as regards technical measures for demersal 
and pelagic fisheries in the Celtic Sea, the Irish Sea and West of Scotland. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [223]
